cards.description: Esta aplicaci√≥n fue desarrollada para la contrataci√≥n r√°pida e inmediata de usuarios en contextos de medio tiempo o eventos especiales que requieren m√°s personal.
Esta es una plataforma que permite visitas virtuales a propiedades y proyectos para la venta utilizando la mejor tecnolog√≠a para este mercado.
Basado en una econom√≠a circular, el concepto principal es 'arrendar en lugar de comprar'. El objetivo es tener experiencias sin obtener productos innecesarios.
Nuestra soluci√≥n para el inventario de productos en las tiendas de una cadena minorista, optimiza los procesos y permite una mayor eficiencia del servicio.

sectionMain.mainTitle: Nothing is complex! Make it simple.
sectionMain.mainText: We are a group of Software enineers capable of making the impossible possible. We like to deliver value to your business by doing what we like the most.

cards.text: Modernization of Labor contracts for Chile
cards.description: Automation of the process of evaluation and signing of contracts, the goal is to avoid doing such work in a notary‚Äôs office. With our system any employer can digitally generate a valid contract which can be signed online, making use of a digital signature from MiDT portal.
cards.alt: miDT - Direcci√≥n del trabajo, Chile

cards.text: Web de Directores & Web de Gesti√≥n
cards.description: Tailor-made document management system that allows indexing documents from the vaults of Meridian BlueCielo. The main idea of this project is to make available sensitive information of the results of the Metro board of directors meetings; the system should be fast and easy to adopt.

This is a semi-automated system to perform in-store pickup, which is integrated with the current Falabella Click and Collect systems. It consists of two parts; first there is the warehouse where orders are stored and service modules that have two mechanical doors (one facing the warehouse and another towards the customer). In these modules the orders are located for their subsequent withdrawal. Second, there is a raspberry running an application developed in Java FX, that handles the logic of opening and closing doors and helps the customer that comes to withdraw his product.
cards.alt: miDT

cards.description: This application is a new version of the Turnero system, which is used in several countries by Falabella. The previous system presented problems when the internet connection was lost. This caused the desynchronization and loss of attention numbers. To solve this problem, an embedded and local database was created, which is used when the system has no internet connection and also at the time of reconnecting the connection and synchronizing the service numbers.
cards.alt: miDT

sectionMain.mainText: Somos un grupo de Ingenieros de Software capaces de hacer posible lo imposible nos gusta entregar valor de negocio haciendo lo que m√°s nos gusta.

cards.text: Modernizaci√≥n de los contratos Laborales para Chile
cards.description: Digitalizaci√≥n y del proceso de evaluaci√≥n y firma de contratos, la idea principal es evitar realizar dicho trabajo en una notar√≠a, si no que cualquier empleador pueda generar de forma digital un contrato v√°lido y que este pueda ser firmado por un empleado de forma digital haciendo uso de clave √∫nica desde el portal MiDT
cards.alt: miDT - Direcci√≥n del trabajo, Chile

cards.text: Web de Directores & Web de Gesti√≥n
cards.description: Sistemas documentales desarrollados a medida que permiten indexar documentos desde las b√≥vedas de Meridian BlueCielo, la idea principal de este proyecto es disponibilizar informaci√≥n sensible del resultado del directorio de Metro, el sistema deb√≠a ser r√°pido y de f√°cil adopci√≥n.

Este es un sistema semi-automatizado para realizar retiro en tienda de productos, que est√° integrado al los sistemas actuales de Click and Collect de Falabella. B√°sicamente se compone de dos partes; por un lado est√° la bodega donde se almacenan los pedidos y, los m√≥dulos de atenci√≥n que cuentan con dos puertas mec√°nicas, una de cara a la bodega y otra hacia el cliente. En estos m√≥dulos se ubican los pedidos para su posterior retiro y, por otro lado, est√° la raspberry donde est√° montada una aplicaci√≥n desarrollada en Java FX que maneja la l√≥gica de apertura y cierre de puertas y la atenci√≥n del cliente que llega a retirar su producto.
cards.alt: miDT

cards.description: (CL PE CO AR) Esto sistema viene a ser un ReWork del actual turnero ya que el sistema anterior presentaba problemas cuando se perd√≠a conexi√≥n a internet. Esto provocaba la p√©rdida sincronizaci√≥n de n√∫meros, lo que terminaba perdiendo n√∫meros de atenci√≥n. Es por esto que se crea aplicaci√≥n con base de datos embebida y local, la cual se utiliza cuando est√° sin internet y al momento de recuperar la conexi√≥n se deben enviar todos los n√∫meros de atenci√≥n para volver a sincronizar.
cards.alt: miDT

cards.description: This project was based on the creation of an API for the generation of electronic guides for all the orders of Falabella under Google Cloud Platform, also the making of stress tests for integration in the pipeline.
cards.area: Nodejs, POSTMAN, GCP, Jira, gitlab, Zephyr, git, nodejs, k6, Scrum
cards.alt: Falabella, jira, agile, qa, operaciones falabella, pruebas, scrum

cards.description: This project was based on an internal app for the selling of cellphones and plans at Falabella and for this the functional tests of different services were automated.
cards.area: Java, POSTMAN, Zephyr, Jira, gitlab, git, cucumber, Scrum

cards.description: This project was based on the automation of regression tests that were made manually to the different SAG applications. Workshops were made to teach the bests practices and the agile methodology to the development and QA teams.
cards.area: C#, POSTMAN, newman, Jira, Selenium, Specflow, Azure Devops, git, cucumber, nodejs, Scrum, TDD
